translation.en: Kind of undulating hills almost like Lord of the Rings,

translation.ja: 大規模なフェスの開催に必要なのは― 巨額の運営資金だ

translation.en: a facility that can house that kind of event,

translation.en: and a powerful partner.

translation.en: And at that time, one of the biggest players

translation.en: was John Scher from Metropolitan Entertainment.

translation.en: You know, I was a pretty successful promoter. Promoted a lot of big shows.
translation.ja: 大規模なイベントを数多く手がけてきた

translation.en: The Rolling Stones, the Grateful Dead, and The Who.

translation.en: There's never been an event, ever,

translation.en: [Lang] John Scher is a very feisty guy.

translation.en: Very tough, and to me, the right kind of partner.

translation.en: So, I started discussing it with my team.

translation.en: When I first learned of 1999, I burst out laughing.

translation.en: "Come on. What is it, April Fool's Day?"

translation.en: Surely we're not gonna do that again.

translation.en: We had tried to revive Woodstock in 1994.

translation.en: '94 Woodstock had its problems.
translation.ja: 94年のフェスには問題点があった

translation.en: [man] How are things going?

translation.en: Things are going well, except it's starting to rain a little bit.

translation.en: [announcer] Push down the fences and join the party.

translation.en: It's not a free concert. It's a paid concert.

translation.en: The music was absolutely amazing, but it didn't make any money.

translation.en: I mean, we absolutely had to make a profit.
translation.ja: 利益を出す必要があった

translation.en: [Rowland] Michael had found a decommissioned 350-acre Air Force base.

translation.en: And he thought that meant we could make money.

translation.en: They had housing for 15,000 people. They had all the roads.

translation.en: They had security, they had a hospital.
translation.ja: 整備された道に病院もある

translation.en: They had all the stuff that we'd spent millions of dollars to build in '94.

translation.en: John got totally enthused and energized about doing it again.

translation.en: Quite honestly, I thought that, you know, it would make a lot of profit.

translation.en: "That's a bad idea."

translation.en: But John stepped in to overrule the entire board

translation.en: So, we were left doing Woodstock again.

translation.en: [reporter] History is going to repeat itself,
